description: This file defines the 'OmiProxy' class within the 'omi' namespace. It declares methods for managing IPC-based proxy functionality, including mounting and unmounting encrypted bundles, registering and unregistering listeners, and setting implementations. It corresponds to a mock/test framework component related to OMI proxy functionalities in a larger project.
published: OmiProxy(const std::shared_ptr<AI_IPC::IIpcService>&, const std::string&, const std::string&)

classes.name: OmiProxy
classes.description: A mock implementation of the IOmiProxy interface for testing IPC communication and bundle management.

methods.name: OmiProxy
methods.description: Constructor for creating an OmiProxy object.

methods.name: setImpl
methods.description: Sets the implementation of the IOmiProxy interface.

methods.name: mountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Mounts a crypted bundle given its ID, root filesystem path, and JSON configuration, returning the bundle path.

methods.name: umountCryptedBundle
methods.description: Unmounts a crypted bundle given its ID.

methods.name: registerListener
methods.description: Registers an error listener callback and returns its tag.

methods.name: unregisterListener
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered listener based on its tag.
